narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with facility representative.
Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class "A" dealer.
The license fee must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Center Ave. Bldg B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Wlefare Act.
